roleset.name: Cause to be bankrupt

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: Fraudulent loans led to the bankruptcy of many fine, upstanding corporations.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry bankrupt.01, OntoNotes grouping bankruptcy-n sense 2; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: This article has more depth than other material about Nolan Bushnell, as it talks more about the person and his strengths and weaknesses than just his statistics; referring to his bankruptcy of his other major project, Chuck E. Cheese.
example.arg: of his other major project, Chuck E. Cheese.
